explanation: [0-0] The video starts with two young men sitting facing each other on the green grass of a football field, with fences and trees in the distance. The man on the left side of the screen is wearing a gray sports T-shirt with khaki and brown sleeves, black leggings, and the man on the right side of the screen is wearing a black sports suit with orange stripes on his T-shirt and shorts. They each hold an orange-red cone in their right hand. In the distance, a person wearing a lavender top and black pants is standing with a soccer ball in front of him.

[0-8] Then the two sitting men toss the cones up, the cones flip and land upright on the grass side by side. The person in the lavender top kicks the soccer ball, but it doesn't hit the cones. Immediately, the two in front toss the cones again, the cones flip and land upright on the grass, one after the other. The person in the lavender top kicks the soccer ball towards the man on the right side of the screen, who catches it with his right hand. Afterwards, the two continue to toss the cones. The cone tossed by the man on the right side of the screen lands upright on the grass, while the cone tossed by the man on the left side of the screen fails to stand. He holds the cone in his hand as the person in the lavender top kicks the ball towards him, hitting the cone in his hand and bouncing away.
